Sentencas: A biogas-fueled flame fuel cell (FFC) unit is proposed for the micro-combined heat and power (CHP) system using indigenous energy source.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: With fuel-rich flame as both heater and reformer, FFC is advantageous for quick start-up, no sealing, and simple thermal management.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: In this study, a porous media burner with non-catalytic fuel-rich combustion was utilized to provide both stable high temperature environment and reformed syngas for the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: The porous media burner and a micro-tubular SOFC were integrated directly in the biogas FFC reactor.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: The performance of fuel-rich combustion and electrochemical characteristic was studied for various equivalence ratios from 1.2 to 1.4.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: Experimental results showed that the reforming efficiency reached 423% with the porous media burner, using model biogas of 60% CH4 and 40% CO2 as fuel.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: The maximum power for a single tubular fuel cell reached 1.4 W when fed with model biogas at an equivalence ratio of 1.4.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system

Sentencas: Furthermore, performance degradation caused by carbon deposition at the anode was investigated.
Titulo: Biogas-fueled flame fuel cell for micro-combined heat and power system
